section.title: Menu
section.para:
Dashboard after log in to the eformsign Dashboard When you click the menu icon(
) on the top left, you will see a side menu as shown below. Each menu may appear differently depending on the permissions you have. The company administrator can access to all the menus and have all the permissions.
Each menu is as follows:

listitem.para: New document: New document Shows the template list where the user can click a template and start to create the document.
Documents: Documents Shows the documents list that is related to you.
In progress: In progress Views the list of documents you have created or processed that are incomplete.

Action required:
Action required Views the list of documents that other members sent to you for approval or sign.
Completed: Completed View the list of completed documents among the documents created by you.

Manage documents: Manage documents Only document managers can access this menu. Document managers can view all documents created from a template for which they have permission. The company administrator can view and manage all the documents.
My signature: My signature You can create and save you signature which can be used when signing a document.
Manage templates: Manage templates Only template managers can access this menu. You can view the template list and configure template settings.
Manage company: Manage company Only company mangers can access this menu. You can check and edit company information.

Company profile:
Company profile You can view and edit the company information.
Manage groups: Manage groups You can create a group or edit group information.

Manage members:
Manage members You can invite members, or edit member information.

Manage custom fields:
Manage custom fields You can enter or edit additional information about your company, groups, and members.

Notification template management:
Notification template management You can view and edit the list of email and SMS notification templates sent by eformsign.
Integration: Integration Only company administrator can access this menu. You can connect external services to eformsign.
Cloud storage: Cloud storage You can link your Dropbox, Google Drive, or Box accounts to save the completed documents.

Analytics & reporting:
Analytics & reporting You can connect you Google Spreadsheet, Office 365 Excel account to save the data entered into the document.

API / Webhook: API
Webhook You can create, edit, or delete the API and webhook keys to use the eformsign API.
Billing: You can check your plan and payment history, and change your plan or payment method.
Usage status: You can check weekly, monthly, and annual service usage status.
Download eformsign form builder: Download Form builder You can download a Foam builder which is necessary to create e-forms(templates) in Microsoft Office files.

section.title: Dashboard page
section.para: Dashboard The dashboard page is the main page you can see when you log in to eformsign. Views documents that are in progress and require my action and provides shortcut to main menus including New document page.

listitem.para: New document Provides shortcut to the New document page where you can create new documents from existing templates.
In progress Displays the number of documents that are in progress and click the box to go to the In progress document page where you can see the list of documents.
Action required Displays the number of documents that requires my action and goes to the Action required document page by clicking the box.
Completed Provides shortcut to the Completed document page where you can view the completed documents that you created.

Displays the recent 3 documents in the list and the number of documents that are in progress. Click the document name in the list to open the document and click More to go to the In progress document page.

Displays the recent 3 documents in the list and the number of documents that require my action. Click the document name in the list to open the document and click More to go to the Action required document page.
Displays the recent 3 documents in the list. Click the document name in the list to open the document and click More to go to the Completed document page.

tip.para: You can add a template that you often use to Favorites to easily create document from the template. You can add Favorites in the Dashboard.

listitem.para: Then, the list of templates that are not Favorites will be displayed in the pop-up window.
Tick the checkbox of the template you want to add to Favorites.
Click the Select button and it will be saved to your Favorites.

section.title: View and change basic information
section.para:
My profile To view your personal information that you entered when signed up for the eformsign service and your company information, click the icon(
at the top right corner of the sidebar menu.

figure.title: Then, the submenu will be displayed as follows:

listitem.para: Change company: Change company If you are a member of multiple companies, click the Change company menu to view the list of your companies and select to change the company.

My profile: My profile You can view and edit your personal information that you entered when signed up for the eformsign service and you also can view the company information that you are the member of.
Logout: Logout You can logout eformsign service.
You can view and edit name, email or ID, password, and contact number of your eformsign account.
You can link, or unlink your social accounts including Google and Facebook.
You can view whether you agreed to receive marketing emails and you can select to agree or not.
You can delete your eformsign account by clicking Delete the eformsign account.
You can view basic information of your company including company name, country, language and contact number.
You can view detailed information of you company including company address, company registration number, homepage URL, and administrator’s email.

note.para: You can only view company information in this menu. If you want to edit information, go to the Manage company > Company profile menu. Only the Company administrator or company manager can edit company information.

listitem.para: If you want withdraw from the company, click the Withdraw from this company. Then, the list of companies that you are a member will be displayed and you can select a company that you want to withdraw from.

important.para: If a member withdraws form a company, the member can still use account and join another company or create a new company.

If the company administrator withdraws from the company, the company will be deleted. If the administrator want to withdraw from the company without deleting the company, the administrator has to delegate the permission to other member and then withdraw from the company.

section.title: Edit and add company information
section.para: The company information that is viewed in My profile > company can be edited in Manage company > Company profile. Company profile

note.para: Only the Company administrator or Company manager can perform this action.

listitem.para: In the sidebar menu, click and go to Manage company > Company profile.
Edit the information you want in the Company profile > Basic information.
Click the Save button to save the edited information.

section.title: Company brand
section.para: Company brand You can replace eformsign logos and symbols with your company logos and symbols by registering them as your company information.

note.para: Both logos and symbols are representative images of the company. Many logos have a long horizontal format that includes the brand name, and a symbol that has only a square image.
We recommend 512 X 128 horizontal images for logos and 120 X 120 square images for symbols.

para.emphasis: Registering the company logo and symbol

listitem.para: In the sidebar menu, click and go to Manage company > Company profile.
Click the Company brand tab.
Click the image in the Brand image > Logo.
Select and upload a logo image file saved in your PC.
Image size: 512 pixel x 128 pixel image size recommended
File size: Maximum of 300KB
File type: PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF
Click the Save button at the top right corner of the page to apply your changes.
Check the changed logo in dashboard.

section.title: Permissions
section.para: eformsign provides 5 types of roles which can be granted to members based on the permissions they have. Types of access control are as follows:

listitem.para: Company administrator The company administrator is a representative of the company and have all the permissions for using eformsign service.

para.emphasis: Company manager Company manager has access to the Manage company menu

listitem.para: Company manager has access to the Manage company menu. The manager can view and edit company, group and member information and grant permissions to members.
Template manager Template manager has access to the Manage template menu. Template manager can create new templates by using Form builder or Web form designer and edit, deploy, and delete templates.
Document manager can access the Manage document menu to view and download documents created from each template. Document manager
Document manager can be set for each template.

Permission to create new document
Template usage Template usage permission can be granted by each template. Only the member with the template usage permission can create documents from that template.

section.title: Company administrator
section.para: Company administrator The user who created the company is a company administrator as default, and is a super administrator with all the permissions using eformsign service.
The company administrator

listitem.para: has access to all menus.
can create, edit, delete, and manage templates.
can create, view, and manage all documents.
If the company administrator needed to be changed, the company administrator can delegate its role to other member.

section.para: When the company administrator deletes the eformsign account, the company will also be deleted. In order not to delete the company, the company administrator has to delegate the permission to the other member and then delete the account. Delegating Company administrator permissions

note.para: Only the company administrator can perform this action.

listitem.para: In the sidebar menu, click and go to Manage company > Company profile.
Click Edit in the Detailed information section, and then click the Delegate role link on the right side of the Administrator item.
Select a member to delegate the company administrator role in the Delegate role pop-up window.
Enter the company administrator’s password.
Click the Save button to save the change.

section.title: Company manager
section.para: Company manager Company manager can access the Manage company menu and can view, edit, and delete the information regarding the company and groups/members. The company manager permissions can be granted by the company administrator or company manager to member.

note.para: Only the company administrator or company manager can perform this action.

listitem.para: In the sidebar menu, click and go to Manage company > Manage members.
Select a member to grant a permission to manage template in the member list.
On the Member info section which is displayed on the right side of the member list, tick the Manage company checkbox in the Permission item which is on the bottom of the Member info.
Click the Save button.

section.title: Template manager permissions
section.para: Template manager permissions Template manager can access to the Manage template menu and can register, edit, deploy, and delete templates.
Template manager who registered the template is the owner of the template.
If there are several template managers in the company, the template manager and template owner may be different.
If the template manager is not the owner of the template, the manager only can view the template settings and duplicate the template.

note.para: Only the company administrator or Template manager can perform this action.

listitem.para: In the sidebar menu, click and go to Manage company > Manage members.
Select a member to grant a permission to manage template in the member list.
On the Member info section which is displayed on the right side of the member list, tick the Manage templates checkbox in the Permission item which is on the bottom of the Member info.
Click the Save button.

section.title: Template usage (=document creation) and document management permissions
section.para:
Template usage
Document management Template usage permission is to allow creating document from the template and document management permission is to allow manage created documents and data.
The members with the Template usage permissions can create documents using the template in the New document page.
The members with the Document management permissions can view, delete, and download the documents created from the template in the Manage documents page.

para.emphasis: Granting permissions for template usage and document management

note.para: Only the Company administrator or Template manager can perform this action.

listitem.para: In the sidebar menu, click and go to Manage templates page.
Click and go to the Set permissions tab.
Select groups or members for each permission to be granted.
Click the Save button.

section.title: Manage groups and members
section.para:
You can invite, delete, edit members and create, add, and delete groups in the Manage company menu.
Manage groups
Manage members

para.emphasis: You can invite members to the company or manage invited members in the Manage members menu.

listitem.para: Active members You can view the list and information of the active members in the company.
Inactive members You can view the list and information of the inactive members.
Invited members You can view the list and information of the invited members.
You can view, edit, or delete the member information in the Member info section on the right side by clicking the member in the list.
You can view member information, change member status, and grant permissions including manage company, or manage templates to the member.
You can set the field values that are related to the members.
Transfer documents When the member no longer uses the eformsign service, the documents of the member can be transferred to other members.
Bulk-invite You can invite several members at once.
Invite members You can invite members via email or ID.
When you click theRecycle Bin icon, the checkboxes will be activated on the left column of the member list. Tick the member to delete and click the Delete button.

section.title: Manage groups
section.para: You can create groups in the company and view, edit, or delete the group information.

listitem.para: When you click the group on the list, you can view the group name and description of the group on the right side and also can edit the information in the Group information section.
You can view the list of the members in the group and can add or remove members from the group.
You can set the field values that are related to the group.
When you click the Create a group button, the Create a group pop-up window will be displayed. Enter group name, description, and search and add members to create a group.
When you click the Recycle Bin icon, the checkboxes will be activated on the left column of the group list. Tick the group to delete and click the Delete button.

section.title: My signature
section.para:
You can easily use your signature to be applied to documents by registering your signature, initial, and stamp in the My signature menu.
My signature

note.para: This work can be done in the PC, mobile, and application.

listitem.para: In the sidebar menu, click and go to the My signature menu.
Click the Register button to add new signature/initial/stamp.
You have to draw your signature on the screen.
Type your name and then select a signature style.
QR code If you scan QR code with the smartphone camera, you can access to the sign pad page. Draw your signature on the sign pad.
Push notification Select a mobile device that you want to connect and click the Send button. You can write your signature using eformsign app installed on the device connected.
Click the OK button to save the signature.
Click the Edit or Delete buttons to edit or delete the signature.

section.para: Register stamp Some documents may require an official seal or personal stamp rather than signing on the document. In the eformsign service, you can use stamp image to be applied on the document.

note.para: You have to prepare the image of the stamp.

listitem.para: Image type: PNG, JPG
File size: Maximum of 300KB
In the sidebar menu, click and go to the My signature menu.
Click the Register button to add new stamp.
Click the image area and then pop-up window will be displayed where you can upload image from your PC. Select the stamp image that you want to register.
Click the OK button to save the stamp.
Click the Edit or Delete buttons to edit or delete the registered stamp.
